dict.acceptation: 总的；粗俗的；显而易见的；恶劣的；

sent.orig: Gross said his findings are on early data available on the Chile earthquake.
sent.trans: Gross说他的发现是基于智利地震的早期数据。

sent.orig: A few months ago Mr Gross pioneered an alternative to the pay-per-click model.
sent.trans: 几个月前Gross开发了一种代替点击付费广告的模式。

sent.orig: Gross government debt is close to 200 per cent of gross domestic product.
sent.trans: 日本政府债务总额接近国内生产总值(GDP)的200%。

sent.orig: Gross income and gross profit are not absolutely and synchronous increase and decrease.
sent.trans: 总收益与总利润并非绝对同步增减。
